mess.description: MANDATORY if given file is of the RMF file format.

copyAfterBuild.description: Optional. Copy the build to the specified folder.

resguy.description: RECOMMENDED. If specified, generates a RES file and copy all the assets the map uses into the build folder. If not specified, assets used by the map wonâ€™t be copied into the build folder!

spriteMaker.description: Optional. If specified, generates or updates sprites before build.

wadMaker.description: Optional. If specified, generates or updates the specified WAD file before build.

compilers.description: MANDATORY if given file is of the RMF or MAP file format.
